text: Sully is a 2016 American biographical drama movie directed and co-produced by Clint Eastwood. It is written by Todd Komarnicki. It is about the US Airways Flight 1549 and Chesley "Sully" Sullenberger, based on the autobiography Highest Duty by Sullenberger and Jeffrey Zaslow. The movie stars Tom Hanks as Sullenberger, with Aaron Eckhart, Laura Linney, Anna Gunn, Autumn Reeser, Holt McCallany, Jamey Sheridan, and Jerry Ferrara. The movie was released by Warner Bros.Sully in IMAX on September 9, 2016. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2016 drama movies Category:2010s historical movies Category:2010s biographical movies Category:American biographical movies Category:American drama movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by Clint Eastwood Category:Movies based on autobiographies Category:Movies set in 2009 Category:Movies about aviation accidents or incidents
title: Sully (movie)
